main event: Observers in Tacoma, Washington reported seeing a bright yellow circular object that turned green and then disappeared behind trees on July 19, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only a fraction of a second,Two separate groups of witnesses reported seeing bright red lights in the sky the same evening,One group used a 120-power telescope to observe the lights,Dr. Joseph C. Hynek noted that the lights moved in a strange, jumbling motion and seemed very high when they disappeared,The Weather Bureau reported no balloons present in the area during the sightings.
witness description: a family at a University City home and Dr. Joseph C. Hynek with two neighbors
